review: Brilliant piece of hardware at throwaway price. . Definitely worth buying. Works very well with all my devices- macbook android phone
author: Sunit Gupta

review: The Chromecast has been a great device to stream Netflix to my HDTV.  I bought this mainly to stream Netflix and Youtube and it's worked well and met my expectations.  One area that I have not used is Chromcast from a laptop of PC, I believe this would be very usefull to share a webpage.Setup and install was very easy using the directions provided in the box.  Chromecast comes with a small HDMI extension cable that should allow the connection to most HDMI ports, USB Power Supply, and USB to micro USB cable, Chromcast, and instruction manual.
author: Ryan

review: LOVE the Chromecast. I use it all the time. It's pretty much all I use to watch tv shows and movies.

review: Limited options. No general streaming. Google need to try harder and open up the streaming to other applications and more countries.

review: Works great!  Streams Netflix and YouTube very well at home, or on the road.  A real bargain for such a low price.
author: Amazon Customer

review: This device is so simple to setup and use.  It works with all of my devices (cell phone, tablet, laptop) with no problem.  I would have given it 5 stars if more apps supported it.  At the time I am writing this Hulu, Netflix, Pandora, and YouTube are supported. From what I hear though many more are coming out shortly.  Thank you Google.
